component.name: AnimationColorExample
component.script:
sub init() examplerect = m.top.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - examplerect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - examplerect.height) / 2 m.top.translation = [ centerx, centery ]
m.coloranimation = m.top.FindNode("exampleColorAnimation") m.coloranimation.repeat = true m.coloranimation.control = "start" end sub
